name: Spaceship Sarlanga
description:
Teresoland is the place where an evil force took all the Light Rhombus. Go with your Spaceship called 'Sarlanga' and take them back!

Spaceship Sarlanga is a hardcore 2D sidescroller shmup that focus more on flight controls than shooting. Will you be able to get all the Light Rhombus and escape in time?

Controls:

* A: Change steer direction

* Spacebar: Steer

* D: Shoot

* 1 to 5: Change Speed

* P: Reset Achievements

Game made for the Global Game Jam 2018.

Credits: 

* Game Design and programming: Adrián Novell

* Programming assistance: Juan Fran
